actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to law and precedent, the Clerk directed the Reading Clerk to call the roll for the Election of the Speaker. Accordingly, the Honorable Mike Garcia of California placed the name of the Honorable Kevin McCarthy into nomination for the Office of Speaker, the Honorable James E. Clyburn of South Carolina placed the name of the Honorable Hakeem S. Jeffries into nomination for the Office of Speaker, the Honorable Matt Gaetz of Florida placed the name of the Honorable Jim Jordan into nomination for the Office of Speaker, and the Honorable Lauren Boebert placed the name of the Honorable Kevin Hern into nomination for the Office of Speaker. No other nominations were put forward.
Ms. Stefanik made a point of order that a quorum was not present. Accordingly, Members-elect were counted and the Clerk announced that 275 Members-elect being counted, a quorum was present.
The Clerk led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
The Clerk announced approval of the Journal.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
